_header: I wot a bird in bower bright / That fully seemly is on sight
_description: The loveliest lady in the land — ten 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb) and 4-line burden: ‘Blow northerne wynd / sent þou me my suetyng / blow norþerne wynd / blou blou blou’.

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Ichot a burde in boure bryhtÞat sully semly is on
                    syht…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…For hire loue mournyng Y makeMore þen eny
                    mon
